1using System;

16namespace Y.Vista
17{
21 public partial class Perfil : Window
22 {
23 private UsuariModel usuari;
24 private bool placeholderUsername;
25 private bool placeholderNom;
26 private bool placeholderCognom;
27 private bool placeholderCorreu;
28 private bool placeholderTelefon;
33 public Perfil(UsuariModel u)
34 {
35 InitializeComponent();
36 TxtBoxUsername.Text = u.Username;
37 TxtBoxNom.Text = u.Nom;
38 TxtBoxCognom.Text = u.Cognom;
39 TxtBoxCorreu.Text = u.Correu;
40 TxtBoxTelefon.Text = u.Telefon;
41 placeholderUsername = false;
42 placeholderNom = false;
43 placeholderCorreu = false;
44 if (TxtBoxCognom.Text == string.Empty)
45 {
46 placeholderCognom = false;
47 }
48 if (TxtBoxTelefon.Text == string.Empty)
49 {
50 placeholderTelefon = false;
51 }
52 usuari = u;
53 }
59 private void Escriure(object sender, TextChangedEventArgs e)
60 {
61 if (IsInitialized)
62 {
63 ComprovarButton();
64 }
65 }
71 private void TxtBoxUsername_GotFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
72 {
73 if (placeholderUsername)
74 {
75 TxtBoxUsername.Text = string.Empty;
76 TxtBoxUsername.Foreground = Brushes.White;
77 placeholderUsername = false;
78 }
79 ComprovarButton();
80 }
86 private void TxtBoxUsername_LostFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
87 {
88 ComprovarButton();
89 if (TxtBoxUsername.Text == string.Empty)
90 {
91 TxtBoxUsername.Text = "Nom d'usuari";
92 TxtBoxUsername.Foreground = Brushes.LightGray;
93 placeholderUsername = true;
94 }
95 }
101 private void TxtBoxNom_GotFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
102 {
103 if (placeholderNom)
104 {
105 TxtBoxNom.Text = string.Empty;
106 TxtBoxNom.Foreground = Brushes.White;
107 placeholderNom = false;
108 }
109 ComprovarButton();
110 }
116
117 private void TxtBoxNom_LostFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
118 {
119 ComprovarButton();
120 if (TxtBoxNom.Text == string.Empty)
121 {
122 TxtBoxNom.Text = "Nom";
123 TxtBoxNom.Foreground = Brushes.LightGray;
124 placeholderNom = true;
125 }
126 }
132 private void TxtBoxCognom_GotFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
133 {
134 if (placeholderCognom)
135 {
136 TxtBoxCognom.Text = string.Empty;
137 TxtBoxCognom.Foreground = Brushes.White;
138 placeholderCognom = false;
139 }
140 ComprovarButton();
141 }
147 private void TxtBoxCognom_LostFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
148 {
149 ComprovarButton();
150 if (TxtBoxCognom.Text == string.Empty)
151 {
152 TxtBoxCognom.Text = "Cognom";
153 TxtBoxCognom.Foreground = Brushes.LightGray;
154 placeholderCognom = true;
155 }
156 }
162 private void TxtBoxCorreu_GotFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
163 {
164 if (placeholderCorreu)
165 {
166 TxtBoxCorreu.Text = string.Empty;
167 TxtBoxCorreu.Foreground = Brushes.White;
168 placeholderCorreu = false;
169 }
170 ComprovarButton();
171 }
177 private void TxtBoxCorreu_LostFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
178 {
179 ComprovarButton();
180 if (TxtBoxCorreu.Text == string.Empty)
181 {
182 TxtBoxCorreu.Text = "Correu";
183 TxtBoxCorreu.Foreground = Brushes.LightGray;
184 placeholderCorreu = true;
185 }
186 }
192 private void TxtBoxTelefon_GotFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
193 {
194 if (placeholderTelefon)
195 {
196 TxtBoxTelefon.Text = string.Empty;
197 TxtBoxTelefon.Foreground = Brushes.White;
198 placeholderTelefon = false;
199 }
200 ComprovarButton();
201 }
207 private void TxtBoxTelefon_LostFocus(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
208 {
209 ComprovarButton();
210 if (TxtBoxTelefon.Text == string.Empty)
211 {
212 TxtBoxTelefon.Text = "633123123";
213 TxtBoxTelefon.Foreground = Brushes.LightGray;
214 placeholderTelefon = true;
215 }
216 }
220 private void ComprovarButton()
221 {
222 if (!(placeholderUsername || placeholderNom || placeholderCorreu) &&
223 TxtBoxUsername.Text != string.Empty && TxtBoxNom.Text != string.Empty && TxtBoxCorreu.Text != string.Empty)
224 {
225 BtnUpdate.IsEnabled = true;
226 }
227 else BtnUpdate.IsEnabled = false;
228 }
234 private void Update_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
235 {
236 usuari.Username = TxtBoxUsername.Text;
237 usuari.Nom = TxtBoxNom.Text;
238 usuari.Cognom = TxtBoxCognom.Text;
239 usuari.Correu = TxtBoxCorreu.Text;
240 usuari.Telefon = TxtBoxTelefon.Text;
241 UsuariNegoci uNegoci = new UsuariNegoci();
242 uNegoci.Usuari = usuari;
243 uNegoci.Update();
244 MessageBox.Show("S'han actualitzat les teves dades correctament!");
245 this.Close();
246 MainWindow main = new MainWindow(usuari);
247 main.Show();
248 }
254 private void BtnCancelar_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
255 {
256 MainWindow main = new MainWindow(usuari);
257 main.Show();
258 this.Close();
259 }
260 }
261}
